website_summaries.verdict: Excellent price for a fun plush toy that allows you to refill it with your kitty's favorite catnip.
pros: Very soft fabrics used in the construction of the toy, so it's perfect for cuddle time
Catnip inside the toy will keep kitties entertained and engaged
Multiple textures make it appealing to cats
Good price, and it ships with extra catnip
cons: Not made to stand up to rough play

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. Opening the Velcro to fill with catnip is very difficult to do. I actually damaged two of them because the Velcro tears away from the fabric more easily than they separate from themselves. Also, there is next to no room inside to even fill with catnip. I’ve had other refillable toys similar to this and the inside is mostly hollow to make room for catnip. These are tightly filled with stuffing and the pouch is so tiny you can’t put much in at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Chiaramonte

customer_reviews.title: Difficult design
customer_reviews.text: At first the catnip pouch was very difficult to find! It's located at the base of the tail, along the hind quarters. This location is also difficult to refill new catnip or empty old catnip. My cat doesn't like this one as much as other catnip pouch toys he's had. The others filled body pockets with catnip, and were somewhat floppy. This one's body is full of polyfil and is taught and plump, and the catnip only goes into the base of the tail.
customer_reviews.author: Jen M

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The space where you're supposed to put the catnip is so small and difficult to fill, it renders the toy useless. I bought one pack for myself and one as a gift and wound up throwing both away. The only use for this product is to give it to someone you don't like. The same company used to sell "Mouse Full Set of 2" which was much better but is now unavailable. I assumed the pack I bought would be similar.
customer_reviews.author: Feedback

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, poorly made
customer_reviews.text: These lasted about one day with my cat. She’s playful, but not destructive and played with them as one would expect any cat to. If you would like your pet’s toys to actually last, I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Medley

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: What I ordered and what I received is two different things. Also I must include that the spot where you put cat nip is very small.. you can only put maybe a pinch of a cat nip in it. So it’s really not something my cat personally would play with. I get toys similar from another company but I couldn’t find them anywhere anymore so I decided to try this one out. The picture isn’t the same as what I ordered and the hole where the cat nip goes is pretty much useless. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Charmane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but needs improvement - not easy to fill with catnip
customer_reviews.text: These toy mice are cute, and Amazon’s price is far less than Petco or Petsmart - but the opening to fill them with catnip is way too small. And if you do manage to squeeze some catnip in, it barely fits a micro mini teaspoons worth. I like the Velcro idea, but they need to have a bigger opening and less stuffing inside so you can really fill the toy with catnip. The Kong Refillable Toys are much better in this respect.
customer_reviews.author: Oliverpugg

customer_reviews.title: Could use more room to stuff squirrel
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves squirrels, looking out windows or watching on the tv so thought I’d purchase this. She likes it but the gripe I have is there isn’t much space in the Velcro pouch to put more than a pinch of catnip. Then it spills out if you put even a tiny bit more. Afterwards I have to clear the Velcro of the catnip to close it. So tedious and time consuming for such a simple task and cat toy. I had a refillable mouse that had 3x the space from another in-store brand. But she prefers when I divide up an old scrunchi into half and fill it with catnip. (I tie a not at both ends).
customer_reviews.author: Lipstickandguns

customer_reviews.title: Off to our “orphan toy” box but still excellent toys :)
customer_reviews.text: My cats weren’t big fans but they’re extremely picky ex-feral kittens which makes them more like living with cat-monkey-raccoon mashups, and they require toys more like what they’d encounter in the wild. So don’t trust their opinions... As that doesn’t take away from the quality, execution of concept of the product by any means. I can’t wait to pass these on to other friend’s pets or donate them to one of the rescues we work with! They’re wonderful and cute as hecking heck. Just our weird little beasts are all about dog puzzles, hexbugs and driving us into the poorhouse ;)
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: No room for catnip!
customer_reviews.text: If you cat just likes stuffed toys, this one is cute and pretty durable, but as a catnip toy it falls way short. The "pouch" where you can put the catnip is miniscule. I couldn't even fit the top joint of my index finger in it. I kept probing, thinking the pouch must be getting displaced by the stuffing and I hadn't hit it yet. But no, it's just that teeny tiny. There are other much better items if what you really want is a *catnip* toy, not just a toy.
customer_reviews.author: SeraphimaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ask my cat!!!! he loves it
customer_reviews.text: no really ask my cat! he loves the fresh catnip in it. He goes crazy with it for days with fresh nip. he's gone through 3 of these already and it's worth it. we have tried other but he doesn't get the same satisfaction. Any thing for our little guy. he kicks and and tosses this little mice around with no holding back. he's had it for some weeks now and it's hair is all over the floor already. he mutilates them, but get's joy from it. my only problem is the durability but his happiness wins every time.
customer_reviews.author: Sailolau79

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Squirrel is the man
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loves this toy. He lost it and we had to buy another one. We found the first one he he is two Mr. Squirrel. He leaves them in our bed as a girl to us and sometimes at late night he just runs around with it. We do not use cat nip In it. We only use that if he is overstimulated...I have had cats and dogs my whole life and this toy is hands down the best..
customer_reviews.author: john foley

customer_reviews.title: Difficult design & no room for catnip
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a refillable catnip toy. Upon opening package: thought that these were super cute mice, well stitched, & it didn’t feel like a cheap toy. Trying to fill catnip: The catnip pouch is difficult to open and is tiny, making little to no room for catnip. Once filled, you can’t close it with the Velcro strip because the catnip is all over it. Messy toy. Disappointed and would not purchase again or recommend it for others.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: cats love these
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats and they both love these little mice. One kitty will play with anything- the other kitty is an old grump and these are the only thing he’ll play with!! I imagine the catnip helps, but they really enjoy these. They are pretty durable too. After three months, a little stuffing is starting to come out but they are still intact. I would buy this brand of catnip toys again because they seem to last. The cats like them so much, they never get lost under the couch etc!
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: What was the designer or manufacturer thinking?
customer_reviews.text: Opening for inserting catnip is one inch wide and lined on either side with velcro. There is no way to insert the catnip without most of it gunking up he velcro, keeping it from closing well. For the price however, the mice themselves have value as a toy, but not to us, as we already have a dozen pain mice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small pocket
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this little toy and the fuzzy tail is a texture my kitty really likes. HOWEVER, the pocket that you put catnip in is very small compared to the toy. I have the mouse catnip toy from this same brand and basically the whole mouse is a pocket for catnip but with the squirrel it was way to small. They could have easily made the tail the catnip pocket and it would be great but as it is I had to cut open the pocket and pull out some stuffing to make room for more catnip and my cat was way more interested in it after that.
customer_reviews.author: Holidae

customer_reviews.title: Opening too small for catnip.
customer_reviews.text: The hole where the catnip goes is so tiny and shallow you can't even fit the tip of your finger in it. Makes it nearly impossible to put any catnip inside of it. I only manage a tiny pinch. Also, after 2 days one mouse came apart at the seams. I've since sewn it. Then another came apart in the same place a few weeks later. Other than that, they are very cute and look like real little mice.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Maynard III

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I received this and my cat was not interested in it at all. The so-called pocket that had the catnip in it was so tiny that I could barely open it and when I did I could not close it and the tiny bit of catnip that was in it fell out. Totally unimpressed with this!! I tried spraying it with some catnip but my cat was still not interested at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Donaghy

customer_reviews.title: Best refillable cat toy ever. Large size and fluffy tail make it seem real.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best of all the refillable cat toys we've ever purchased. Our cat loves to wrestle and fight with this one, because it's so large he thinks he's wrestling another animal. The tail is really nice too, feels like real fur. Refillable with fresh catnip so it never gets stale. Five stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ess

customer_reviews.title: The best catnip soft toy.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first catnip toy that my 2 cats couldn’t bite or chew a hole in! All others were cute but my cats would have chewed through the fabric within minutes. Not on these so no mess to clean up. They have so much fun tossing them catching them and rolling on them. Get this one if you want one that your cat will enjoy and not destroy! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Spring

customer_reviews.title: it's a cat toy
customer_reviews.text: it's a cat toy so you never really know if your cats will go for it until you try. My one cat loves them, the others are a little meh about them. But my only peeve is that the section to put catnip in is so small that it's basically more trouble to use it than it would be to just sprinkle catnip on the outside of the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived torn.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these so much! Much sturdier than similar products so this was my second time buying this set. Unfortunately these arrived with one already torn open and another close to tearing. They should be inspected before sending out damaged products.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mouw

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this! Still holding up well!
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging. It’s very well made. I have two giant Maine Coons and it has stood up to their chewing and rough play and it still going strong! It’s hard to find good quality toys for them that are worth this cost. This one checks all the boxes. They love it, are excited to play and it stands up to their shenanigans.
customer_reviews.author: Barbee Q

customer_reviews.title: Ok - but catnip pouch is way too small - my cats were not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The space to insert catnip is extremely small and the catnip didn't impress my cats even when I dumped it on the floor. The mice look well made but one came apart the first day, I bough these because my cats LOVE the Petlinks caterpillars sold here , The caterpillars are not refillable but they do have crinkle sound. I recommend them instead.
customer_reviews.author: seven12

customer_reviews.title: Replacements for my cats favorite mouse toy.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my cats and they don't have any hard shell inside like some that break easily, especially if stepped on. These my cats love as they are soft so if you throw it to them and it is easy to catch in their mouths or by their claws. The only problem I had was the Velcro pouch it too small and difficult to get enough catnip in to it. Other than that they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Capixaba

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves to murder this toy
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I saw the tiny catnip pouch in the back, but I filled it up and tossed it to my cat. He gleefully murdered it. Literally. He ripped the velcro back open to get to the catnip. Thankfully I was able to just stuff the catnip back inside and close the toy back up. I'll call this a success. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moureau

customer_reviews.title: To big for cats to carry so if your cat carries their babies like mine this won’t work
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates this toy it’s way to big he wants to try to carry around his car nip toys and love on them as the cat nip acts like the drug extacy and makes him think he’s one sexy beast so he rubs all over and likes them and this one is far to big for that so he won’t even mess with it
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth

customer_reviews.title: Not for my cats
customer_reviews.text: This overstuffed squirrel should be a good cat toy. I can smell the catnip. The hair fibers on its tail are realistic. My cats just don’t like it. So Mr. Squirrel sits sadly and lonely on the windowsill until the dog finds him and rips out his stuffing.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this toy
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this toy. I've bought other soft catnip toys for my cat in the past but, they all shed badly and were useless within a few weeks. This toy is soft but sturdy. The catnip pocket is tiny bur effective. Every time I refill it, my cat goes bunkers. The velcro pouch holds the catnip very well although it took me a day or two to become adept at filling it with a good amount of catnip.
customer_reviews.author: S. Spence

customer_reviews.title: It is an okay toy
customer_reviews.text: I sort of like the product. My cat only enjoys to play with the brown mouse. Unfortunately, after rough playing the mouse started to loose some pieces such as the ears, and tail and top part of the mouse ripped. My cat only plays with that mouse so i had to sew it back. However, now he plays with it several times, not as often as before.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: WTH????
customer_reviews.text: The mice don't open so you can stick the catnip in them. There is a velcro closure but you open it and nothing can go inside. It's a fake pocket. What in the world? Why would they go through all the trouble of making a flap and not have a pocket to put it in?
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Built nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good deal for the price. Nice construction. Seems like it will last a long time. Only wish it had a deeper pocket for the catnip. I could not even get a small pinch in ours. Senior cat not amused but it made great cat bed decorations and the kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: My cats do flips for them!
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE it compared to what I used to get at the $ store and I do to. It doesn't get lost like the smaller other ones. I do take the little pouches out that are way to small to hold a significant amount of catnip and a little of the stuffing to make it easier to get more of the nip in. LMBO! They are so funny how they rub and slobber all over them, wrestle and rear feet thump them. Thank goodness they can't catch the real thing! Even my most snippy snobby cat loves them.!
customer_reviews.author: Mardee

customer_reviews.title: Great Toys For The Price
customer_reviews.text: There’s a little pouch in the mousies tummies which is velcroed shut where you put the catnip. My kitty loves the catnip which came with the 3 mice. She likes the mice but her arthritic mommy has a hard time getting the mousies tummies open to stuff in the catnip.
customer_reviews.author: suz

customer_reviews.title: It is a cute toy though and my cat seems to enjoy it from time to time as a regular toy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold the catnip well. The area that holds the catnip is tiny and secures with velcro. My cat had little interest because he couldn't smell the catnip. It is a cute toy though and my cat seems to enjoy it from time to time as a regular toy. It does come with a decent amount of catnip though which I just use separately.
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: Toy
customer_reviews.text: My cats are a bit older and they just didn't really want to play, except for my male cat (who is 5 years younger than them) likes to rub his head on the toy amd and occasionally throw it up in the air and then race to get to where it might land.
customer_reviews.author: Kjbengtson22

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: The squirrel is great! Big enough to not get lost under/behind things, but small enough for them to flip around. Our 6 year old and kitten both love flinging it around. Quality is good, Im going to buy another for a backup. Update: The kitten absolutely loves the squirrel, she will talk and chirp to it every night as she flings it around, it's the only toy she reacts to that way.
customer_reviews.author: Saphyress

customer_reviews.title: Refillable but not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this toy is refillable with catnip, but the fabric part started to tear off in my cat's mouth. Don't think it's great for cats to swallow fabric. Petlinks, make this one sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Squirrel...
customer_reviews.text: So ugly, you won't feel sorry for it when your cat plays with it! You insert the catnip behind the tail so if you have young boys (or are immature yourself), you'll either cringe or laugh while stuffing it! This inanimate object sheds like an actual squirrel, so it's got realism going for it!
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Great refillable cat toy
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves this toy! It's a plush fish toy (my cat took the feathers off the top of it within about an hour) that my cat loves to bat around. The opening for catnip is small, but big enough to put a few whole catnip leaves into. It came with a container of dried catnip as well, which I imagine could be somewhat messy considering the opening only closes with velcro, but overall this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn C

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Toy! Charlie LOVES it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat, Charlie, LOVES this toy. They are very easy to refill with fresh catnip. They are soft and light which makes it easy for my cat to toss in the air and chase. Charlie and I both recommend this cat toy very enthusiastically.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: The cats love these. However, they are very cheaply made. When I tried to open the velcro, it came off of the frabic. Also the pocket that holds the catnip is way too small because you can’t fit any catnip inside and be able to velcro the pocket shut. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Awen

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kitten who likes to drown his toys. This is much larger than expected (about 5") but that is not an issue because it has not been put in the water bowl since he's had it. He is also able to jump onto the bed with this in his mouth, so it is not too large for play either.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Papesh

customer_reviews.title: Cats love these mice!!
customer_reviews.text: Cats love these sturdy mice!! The fellow in the video plays with them, like them and just has cat fun. In the video, I sprinkled an extra bit of catnip for him so it was double good. Ha! He is now sleeping soundly while holding the grey mouse! Successful capture!
customer_reviews.author: March

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I expected. I tossed down in the basement since no one was playing with it. Each night it makes its way up the stairs and into the bed. Apparently they really like it
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Needs modification
customer_reviews.text: I grow my catnip fresh indoors so needed a refillable toy. This works and, is soft and fluffy and cheap. It was hard to find the catnip pocket (on left side at base of tail) and it is tiny, suitable for about a teaspoon of dried herb. I pulled out the pocket and cut it off, then pulled out some of the dacron stuffing to make room for fresh catnip cuttings, and the puss-pot thinks that’s a great idea and has a lot of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Harden

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is my cat's favorite toy. The pocket for the catnip is very small. You can barrely put anything in it. My cat plays with it a regular toy. Sometimes I spray some catnip spray in it. Good overall quality, however my cat was able to rip a hole in it
customer_reviews.author: MC543

customer_reviews.title: Only one is for catnip
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit misleading. You think you’re getting 2 refillable catnip toys but it’s only the brown one that’s refillable. False advertising. The kitties like it though
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W.

customer_reviews.title: A great cat toy
customer_reviews.text: I heard one of my cats making a horrible crying sound, but it was a triumphant cat that killed a “prey.” He brought this toy to me and was so proud of himself. I’m really pleased I bought this one - will buy more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Pat J

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these
customer_reviews.text: My cat has never been attached to a toy but she LOVES These mice! Unfortunately she was able to RIP off the tails within 24 hrs. The velcro on one of the three does not open and I'm unable to add catnip to that one.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not functional for catnip
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, but the catnip really has no place to go. The pouch to put it in is basically non existent, and I ended up having to just put a tiny sprinkle in the actual velcro. Not was I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: C H

customer_reviews.title: A Cute Kitten's Favorite New Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Gave one of these to a friend for their kitten as a Christmas gift. She says it is his new favorite toy and at times thinks it's "Rocky The Flying Squirrel" with how he tosses it around!! He can't get outside to chase the real ones he sees daily through the window, so this is a great substitute. (Please don't send me questions, because I don't have the toy!)
customer_reviews.author: Viobass21

customer_reviews.title: Cute catnip toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little stuffed animal with a small pouch (open/close with Velcro) in which you can put catnip (small tube provided). Your cat will love to bat it around and carry it and enjoy the catnip too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bezz

customer_reviews.title: Can't really be refilled with Catnip
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made toy. The problem is the catnip rifill design just isn't adequate. It just does not work. If the catnip refillability isn't important your cats will still enjoy playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Blade Runner

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open, catnip useless
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. Opening the Velcro to fill with catnip is near impossible. There is no room inside to even fill with catnip. I’ve bought other mice like these but different brands and it was never an issue. The catnip itself doesnt even interest my cat at all. We've even tried just pouring some out. Normally my cat will be waiting for us to throw the mice down to him when he sees new toys. Save your money and get a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Cassie B.

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bengal cat and he absolutely loves these. he will chase them and amuse himself for hours playing. To be honest, only filled them when I got them with cat nip and he is still amused months later. They are his favorite, especially the white one, not sure why the color preference. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Fuller

customer_reviews.title: They look authentic. Our cat loves them.
customer_reviews.text: It is really a nice package, you get three mice and a tube of cat nip. But the pouch under the mouse, does need to be bigger to put the cat nip in. But i will try to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: CaCooper

customer_reviews.title: Nice mice, my big boys both approve
customer_reviews.text: Both my cats have a blast with these. And with both on the larger side and quite powerful, they can really take apart anything not well made, sometimes even well made. These are holding up very well and are much enjoyed
customer_reviews.author: Davepool

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them ❤❤
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these refillable mouses they play with them all the time. They love to lick them to get the cat nip activated it so cute love it. I definitely recommend them for anyone who has cats that love cat nip. 😻😻😻😻❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Theresa P.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and good size
customer_reviews.text: I got this for both cats and new puppy. Not sure if it is a defect, but could not get catnip in tiny hole. Puppy loves it and even with lots of play, it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschoolmommaof4

customer_reviews.title: If your cat likes to play, these are great!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats. Only one plays with these, but that was expected. If you have a cat who likes to play, and is a bit spastic, these are great lol. I've given him other mice and he's hust not interested. With these, they have a little strip of Velcro where you can open and put catnip inside. My cat runs around with them in his mouth, sometimes carrying them by the tail like they are real life (he's never had a real mouse for comparison however). The catnip gets him going and because they are soft, and the perfect size he just loves them! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jess L

customer_reviews.title: My cats give them 5 stars....
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and have a small slit in the belly that allows you to fill it with cat nip,which also comes with them. My cats have been playing with these toys nonstop...Very happy with purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Lyne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor mouse
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that I had to work like a bugger to get the Velcro apart at all then it is not enough to get the catnip in. To bad I also bought some for my daughter's new kitten. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wintle

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious, great for kitten
customer_reviews.text: My kitten absolutely loves this, along with the Rowdy Raccoon by the same company. She carries them around in her mouth, yowling, wanting you to praise her for catching a rodent. It's hysterical. My older cat shows no interest, but huge HUGE hit with the kitten!!
customer_reviews.author: Purdue Fan

customer_reviews.title: My furkids are over the moon
customer_reviews.text: My cat Bunny was over the moon to have her pick of the 3 mice. They are soft, perfect size for your furry friend to drop off in your shoe, and the mice can be loaded with catnip.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Lindgren

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes it...
customer_reviews.text: My cat will like anything with catnip.... but, I wish the opening for the catnip was a little larger... would make putting the catnip in the toy a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: KvO

customer_reviews.title: My Monster LOVES this toy
customer_reviews.text: My cat spends a good part of the day sitting in the window watching birds, chipmunks and squirrels. He actually knows the word squirrel and will run to the window if you say it. I gave him this and he was all over it. He loves it and I keep finding it in the oddest places in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Jess W

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 cats love this catnip toy. It is extremely easy to fill with catnip and you can fit quite a bit in there. The toy is a very soft material for cat head rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice fat little toy that Bob can pick up and pretend it is her baby. However the catnip that comes with it is so stale it is worthless. Just toss that and buy some fresh stiff.
customer_reviews.author: G. Chow

customer_reviews.title: Great toys but a little hard to refill.
customer_reviews.text: Food toys that seem sturdy and are a good value for the money. Hard to fill because cat nip gets stuck in the velcro making it hard to reseal.
customer_reviews.author: AnaKon

customer_reviews.title: They like the feather too
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats and each one of them likes to play with this toy, particularly when the car nip is fresh. They like the feather too.
customer_reviews.author: CKH1944

customer_reviews.title: Makes my old cat playful again
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves these! He's a 16yo siamese and energy has been lacking. He's enjoyed playing with these then laying on them to nap. Nice to see him more active for a change.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi B.

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this.
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to find the right toy that allows you to refill the catnip. My cat loves this toy. Plus its kind of stylish, doesn't look like I have a bunch of baby toys laying around my house. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: The brown one is my cat's favorite toy. As far as build quality goes, I'm glad it's that one, as it's the toughest of the bunch. Unfortunately, she still goes through them like crazy, so I have to keep replenishing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This is my cat Oliver's favorite toy. He walks around with it in his ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my cat Oliver's favorite toy. He walks around with it in his mouth and yowls. He leaves it outside our bedroom door as an offering every morning lol it's hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Lopiccolo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mouse
customer_reviews.text: These are bigger then I thought they would be but my cats love them. There a great value because in the stores they want twice as Much for these and there tiny
customer_reviews.author: ging

customer_reviews.title: Kitties LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: Cats love them, but you can BARELY OPEN the ”pitifully SMALL slit” to insert catnip, so I just “marinate” the mice in a big jar of catnip! They ARE very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: leeward

customer_reviews.title: Larger than regular stuff toys.
customer_reviews.text: I have large Maine coon cat that doesn't like toys. He likes this one. So far, he has only part of tail off. That means it's sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Holds almost no catnip in the pocket.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could refill most of the mouse. The little pockets that hold the catnip are so small you couldn't fit a quarter teaspoon in them. Ridiculous trying to get catnip into the little pocket.
customer_reviews.author: AnAviatrix

customer_reviews.title: and I'm pretty positive these will have their turn at being her ...
customer_reviews.text: Sophie won't go near them, but then she has her current favorites, and I'm pretty positive these will have their turn at being her favorites soon enough. She's a one toy at a time kind of kitty. I like the sizes of these, not too small, not too big. Very well made, appear and feel above average durability, so she won't destroy them in one day when she goes into Ninja Stalking Kitty mode.
customer_reviews.author: Phae

customer_reviews.title: Not worthit.
customer_reviews.text: Like others have stated it is very hard to refill with catnip. Almost impossible to find location and you almost have to rip fabric to try and get it open.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The catnip didnt last long but she loved it for a couple of days. It was inexpensive so I guess you cant expect alot more..
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: My cats had no interest
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and neither one of the were remotely interested in this toy. Obviously, the catnip was either old or the scent was not sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: A. Michelle

customer_reviews.title: They like them.
customer_reviews.text: They love it-only thing is that it is difficult to get catnip inside the pocket, as it is very small. I just rub them in the catnip so the oil gets in them.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price hole is the size of a finger so it's hard to fill and the velcro is peeling off on one of them but the cats do love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian urban

customer_reviews.title: Joy for the cat
customer_reviews.text: Pocket for catnip is so small as to be almost non-existent. Nonetheless the cat loves it. Pretty realistic looking. Think it brings joy to cat for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Healix

customer_reviews.title: Nice cat toy but patience is neccessary for the catnip refill
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the toy itself - as did my cats. I found it a little hard putting new catnip in and reclosing the velcro. A lot of the catnip I put in even fell out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough room for cat nap.
customer_reviews.text: Velco is hard to open. If you can get open, there is really not room for catnip you cant close it. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissybear77

customer_reviews.title: Popular with my cats
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this thing. But then again I’m sure they’d love just about anything if it was filled with catnip.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love refilling when needed.
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to refill my cats catnip toys when it's needed. The Velcro makes it really easy to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Mardee

customer_reviews.title: Not a winner in this house, unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great idea. My cats played with them at first for a little while but haven’t been touched since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: The Cat’s Meow
customer_reviews.text: Three great lifelike looking little mice and a bit of kitty crack to put inside. They love it and I love watching them on it. A good holiday for all!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My youngest kitty's favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for my older cat when he was a baby. I loved that it could be refilled with catnip, and so did he. It was about worn to a nubbin when my younger, second kitty moved in, but she loves it and brings it to me to throw, just like a dog will - she fetches it back to me to throw again, too! So I was really hunting to find another one and LO! here it is on Amazon. It really seems to offer a lot of appeal for a cat, so don't hesitate to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Good price for good toy
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves it. She plays with the fish and squirrel versions about equally. Holds enough catnip for me since i like to refresh it every couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha Centuari

customer_reviews.title: Not refillable
customer_reviews.text: The velcro opening is waaaaaaaaaaaaaayyyyy too small and is impossible to open in order to load catnip. Terrible design.
customer_reviews.author: Nevada Geezer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves all of her toys from this brand and I love that they look nice and don’t leave a cat nip trail behind them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Kalkowski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cat toy
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these and play with them for hours. One of the toys they shredded the tail, so I had to trim it off. They still play with that one.
customer_reviews.author: Blackbird7d

customer_reviews.title: Catnip is stale!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten does not like this toy at all & the so-called catnip is quite stale so it serves no purpose, it has no scent at all!! 🙄🙄 & that was the reason I bought it, because it came with catnip. Smh
customer_reviews.author: TinaK

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fill
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously hard to fill. The pocket isn't even a pocket. I had to cut into it and remove some stuffing in order to get the cat nip inside. My cats don't play with these. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: classybdriver

customer_reviews.title: Good refillable cat toy
customer_reviews.text: For the value, it's a nice cat toy. It's one of the few that is refillable. Pro's are that it's a fair size and it's not heavy so it's easy for the cats to carry around. It also is made of sturdy material. Cons - It doesn't have a large area to add catnip into the toy, which makes it tricky to fill. And the feathers, not sure why they bothered as they were gone within the first hour.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Nice mice 😁
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these. They actually look much better in person than the pictures shows. We purchased them to give our cats something to play with to keep them calm during some home repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

product_meta.title: Petlinks Refillable Catnip Cat Toys
product_meta.description: Style:Plush Player SquirrelRefillable catnip toys are by far the allow you to refresh the catnip in your cat's favorite toy for endless fun. Plush Players refillable catnip toys are extra plush with soft fur to delight your kitty. Plush Players toys also come with a tube of Pure Bliss organic catnip for multiple refills. Pure Bliss tubes are sealed to keep catnip fresh and have a small opening that makes it easy to refill your toy. Petlinks products connect to how people and pets live and play together. Petlinks is known for innovative, solution-based and environmentally responsible products that fulfill all of your pet's needs - from play and interaction to rest and privacy and more. A member of the Worldwise family of pet products, Petlinks is grounded in the principles of pet safety, customer satisfaction and environmental responsibility. Petlinks products are designed to meet or exceed all applicable safety standards. They are then tested against those standards to ensure they meet our strict quality and safety requirements – ensuring they're safe for all members of your family. Petlinks offers a complete satisfaction guarantee. If a customer is dissatisfied with a Petlinks product for any reason, they will replace it or refund it - no questions asked. Since 1990, Worldwise and its brands have been committed to using environmentally responsible materials in its products. Whenever possible, Petlinks products are made with recycled, reclaimed, organic and sustainable materials.
feature_bullets: Extra-plush refillable squirrel catnip toy with tube of Pure Bliss Organic catnip for refills
Larger refillable toy paired with catnip-filled buddy toy
Designed to meet or exceed all applicable safety standards
100 percent customer satisfaction guarantee from Petlinks
